reviews.review_msg: Dr Branda is by far the best prof I have ever had! He comes off as a little intimidating but if you show interest, he is actually very caring. No office hours so ask during class. He is a very sweet man and will help you get good grades if you are willing to work for them. 2nd MT was HARD but final was easy! Just work for it!
very good lecturer. the midterms were fair but hard. the final exam was just brutal. prepare yourself for alot of headaches. I would recommend this prof to anyone taking organic chemistry.

Neil's powerpoint slides are everything. They're nice and clear because he didn't attempt to hand-draw chemical structures. He also loves to get distracted and talks about the chemistry in the real world so his lectures never really get boring. He's a genius and is one of those profs who knows what they're talking about and can actually explain it.

Best prof I have ever had. His lectures are clear and his exams are fair. He is the reason I now love chemistry. Would highly recommend taking a course with him. The only reason to have a text book is to do problems out of, which I'm sure you can probably find online anyways

worth waiting for him to teach ochem2, the lectures are full of real world examples and makes the lecture like something you cant wait for. Clear about what to expect on the exam. Usually ochem is nightmare but neil gives you the confidence to do well in the class. Again it will be worth waiting for him to teach the class.

Wonderful Prof, Great at explaining the material, super clear notes, and straightforward tests. Actually made me like Chemistry . The class is still one of the hardest intro science courses, so you will  need to put in the work.

Rob's totally awesome! He has good notes and explanations of all the concepts. If you don't understand something, he's really easy to approach too, super relaxed and chill; this is one cool guy :) The exams aren't bad either. There are quite a few reactions, but if you keep up, it shouldn't be too bad. One of the best profs I've had :D
his notes are really clear and helpful but the midterms are way to hard. Studying off the notes for the exams will not help at all. Instead do practice questions as much as possible.
